content: It's summer, so I'm back to my 40 hour workweeks M-F, and I spent most of my weekends with friends and the rest of my free time with my girlfriend. I'm just not online nearly as much as I used to be.

title: A time for silence...
content:
Seems similar to how K:M was at one point. There was practically zero activity because everyone was busy with non-modding stuff. Give it time and this place'll pick back up again.

I lurk every couple of days to keep up with what's going on. I've just got some RL stuff to sort out before returning as active as ever.

title: Re: A time for silence...
content: I'm just lazy.
